content.question: A circuit is constructed from a battery of <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>emf</mi></math> <math alttext="open E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Ɛ</mi></math>, a switch, a resistor of resistance <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math>, and an air filled solenoid of length <math alttext="l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="script">l</mi></math>, cross-sectional area <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>A</mi></math>, and <math alttext="N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>N</mi></math> turns. The switch is closed. What is the energy stored in the solenoid when the current in the circuit is <math alttext="I" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>I</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator mu sub 0 times N squared, times A, and denominator l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msup><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="script">l</mi></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator mu sub 0 times N squared, times A l squared, and denominator 2 l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msup><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>A</mi><msup><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="script">l</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator mu sub 0, end sub, squared, times N to the 4 power, times A squared, times I, and denominator 2 l squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msup><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>N</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="script">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator mu sub 0, end sub, squared, times N to the 4 power, times A squared, times I squared, and denominator 2 l squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msup><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>N</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="script">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator mu sub 0 times N squared, times A l squared, and denominator 2 l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msup><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>A</mi><msup><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="script">l</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
